name: agreeproof-backend
description: Backend API for AgreeProof agreement management system

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js'
scripts.build:production: npm run test:ci && npm run lint && echo 'Build completed'
scripts.deploy:render: npm run build:production && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:production && echo 'Deploy to staging'
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && echo 'Deploy to production'
scripts.ci:all: npm run ci:build && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:lint && npm run ci:security && npm run ci:deploy
scripts.cd:verify: npm run health && npm run test:ci
scripts.cd:validate: npm run lint && npm run security:audit
scripts.cd:prepare: npm run build:production && npm run test:ci
scripts.cd:pre-deploy: npm run cd:prepare && npm run cd:validate
scripts.cd:post-deploy: npm run cd:health && npm run cd:verify
scripts.cd:full: npm run cd:pre-deploy && npm run cd:deploy && npm run cd:post-deploy
scripts.dev:reset: npm run dev:clean && npm run build:production
